channel.title: Timeline on Information on the rail yard for Creekside
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline on Information on the rail yard for Creekside

item.title: Interactive version
item.description: A timeline of events leading up to the ROMF/railyard site approval. At each of the time points below, there was no effort by Durham City, Durham County or GoTriangle to directly contact parents, guardians or teaching staff at Creekside Elementary.

item.title: Text version
item.description: .tg {border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;border-color:#999;} .tg td{font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;padding:10px 5px;border-style:solid;border-width:0px;overflow:hidden;word-break:normal;border-color:#999;color:#444;background-color:#F7FDFA;} .tg th{font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:normal;padding:10px 5px;border-style:solid;border-width:0px;overflow:hidden;word-break:normal;border-color:#999;color:#fff;background-color:#26ADE4;} .tg .tg-0lax{text-align:left;vertical-align:top} .tg .tg-0pky{border-color:inherit;text-align:left;vertical-align:top} Year Headline Text Relevant link 2010 Site identification Go Triangle Alternatives Analysis identified 5 sites for the ROMF <https://gotriangle.org/sites/default/files/do_aa_final_report_appendices.pdf> 2012 May 2012 public comment period After four meetings, GoTriangle identified fifth Alston Ave site <https://gotriangle.org/sites/default/files/d-o_lrt_scoping_booklet_04-23-2012_rev_per_fta_v71.pdf> 2012 Environmental Analysis Process GoTriangle hosted more than 300 meetings with public groups 2015 GoTriangle notified Durham Public School District GoTriangle notified Durham Public School District about proposed ROMF at Farrington Road site.
